Name: Lin Wah
Review Text: Ive been coming here with my family since I was a lot younger. The staff is always super friendly and the food is good depending on what you order. The dim Sum takes a bit longer but is worth the wait. Their specialties are also very Good.

Name: Lin Wah
Review Text: Very nice food and hospitality! One of the best restaurants in Almere area. Food and ambiance is worth the price. Lot of options for vegetarians as well. Highly recommended.

Name: Lin Wah
Review Text: Good traditional Chinese interior design. Flavors of the food are decent, but very very salty. Also the price is way too high compared to most famous Chinese restaurants in Amsterdam. Services are okay.

Name: Lin Wah
Review Text: This is a good place to eat chinese. The ambience is quiet especially on a saturday afternoon. The host is very polite and understands your request and makes real good suggestions. They also help with customizing your meals to your liking.

Name: Lin Wah
Review Text: A must go if you like good food.  Nice and cozy place, the host was super dedicated, the food was extremely good and tasty.  Totally recommended! I'm definitively coming back.
